title: FPS Problems
body: So, I used to play league with about 120 fps. And today I logged on during a ranked and it was hardstuck 50. Now, I'm sure everyones going to say the same "You can only see 60fps with human eyes", and my return is... it felt like i was in a constant lag. It just didn't work. I couldn't even last hit properly. I have the fps set to uncapped, and after windows 10 installed a new update, it won't go past 60, no matter what. It's rough for me. Any advice on how to fix it?

replies.body: Hmmmm you mentioned a recent Windows 10 update? Most of the time those updates will automatically turn the Xbox Game DVR stuff back on which is known to cause some FPS issues. Make sure that's turned off and test it in a practice/custom game for me!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IkcsPJgP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-21T04:18:18.337+0000)
>
> Hmmmm you mentioned a recent Windows 10 update? Most of the time those updates will automatically turn the Xbox Game DVR stuff back on which is known to cause some FPS issues. Make sure that's turned off and test it in a practice/custom game for me!

I can safely say that wasn't the issue, sadly.

----But you did drop my ping by 2 <3.
